description: This course involves practice and game observation and a practicum in coaching a sport. Students are involved in practice planning and drill work, game preparation, and administration, as well as game rules and coaching strategies. This course applies toward the coaching sequence only. Prerequisite: Exercise Science 238 and permission of instructor. Offered every year.
name: Coaching Practicum
prerequisites: Prerequisite: Exercise Science 238 and permission of instructor. Offered every year.
